page.title: 05BEXLEYHEATH SPLASHWORLD
page.content: Splashworld is open from 09.00 - 1800hrs. Monday to Friday and 14.00 to 16.00hrs. on Sundays. It comprises of a large swimming pool with three diving boards, a small pool, a splash pool, a sauna bath and an aquazoom. The depth of the pool varies from three to twelve feet, and is used mainly by the general public and schools. It is a popular venue for galas as there is a spectator gallery. The small pool is three feet deep and is for non-swimmers only. It is very warm and used mostly by mothers with toddlers. There are shallow steps at one end. The aquazoom is two large enclosed tubes. People can slide down the tubes into the splash tube. The tubes which twist and turn, are eleven metres above the surface of the pool. Speeds of thirty miles per hour can be reached.
